languages.text: "Ну, как вам сказать... с Лорд-инквизитором на станции все еще сильно не пошалишь, но без Инцендии и ее цепных псов дышится определенно свободнее. Поставки постепенно возобновляются, те, кто Чорда пособничал, пошли на круг, а в "Амасекусе" снова можно спокойно вести дела".

traits.locale_text: "Ну, как вам сказать... с Лорд-инквизитором на станции все еще сильно не пошалишь, но без Инцендии и ее цепных псов дышится определенно свободнее. Поставки постепенно возобновляются, те, кто Чорда пособничал пошли на круг, а в "Амасекусе" снова можно спокойно вести дела".

languages.text: "Well, how should I put it... with the Lord Inquisitor on the station, folks still have to keep a bit of a lid on their activities, but with Incendia and her hounds gone, I can definitely breathe easier. Shipments are slowly starting up again, anyone who worked with Chorda has been thrown for a loop Footfall-style, and folks can do business in the Amasecus again without any trouble."
languages.original_text: "Ну, как вам сказать... с Лорд-инквизитором на станции все еще сильно не пошалишь, но без Инцендии и ее цепных псов дышится определенно свободнее. Поставки постепенно возобновляются, те, кто Чорда пособничал, пошли на круг, а в "Амасекусе" снова можно спокойно вести дела".

Shipments are slowly starting up again, anyone who worked with Chorda has been thrown for a loop Footfall-style, and folks can do business in the Amasecus again without any trouble."

Shipments are slowly starting up again, anyone who worked with Chorda has been thrown for a loop Footfall-style, and folks can do business in the Amasecus again without any trouble."

languages.text: “嗯，该怎么说呢……现在大审判官到了星站，我的小伙子们做事得警惕些才行。不过，因森蒂娅和她的鹰犬滚蛋了，我确实是松了一大口气。货运正在慢慢恢复。所有和库尔达合作过的人，都被踢出了落脚港的圈子。大家又可以在烈酒修会做生意了，不会再遇到任何麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "Well, how should I put it... with the Lord Inquisitor on the station, folks still have to keep a bit of a lid on their activities, but with Incendia and her hounds gone, I can definitely breathe easier. Shipments are slowly starting up again, anyone who worked with Chorda has been thrown for a loop Footfall-style, and folks can do business in the Amasecus again without any trouble."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，该怎么说呢……现在审判长到了星站，我的小伙子们做事得警惕些才行。不过，因森蒂娅和她的鹰犬滚蛋了，我确实是松了一大口气。货运正在慢慢恢复。所有和库尔达合作过的人，都被踢出了落脚港的圈子。大家又可以在烈酒修会做生意了，不会再遇到任何麻烦。”

languages.text: «Bueno, a ver cómo lo digo... Con el Lord Inquisidor en la estación, la gente sigue teniendo que camuflar un poco sus actividades, pero ahora que Incendia y sus perros han desaparecido, respiro con más tranquilidad. Los cargamentos están volviendo a la normalidad, cualquiera que trabajara con Chorda se ha dado un paseo al estilo de Paso y la gente puede volver a negociar en el Amasecus sin problema».
languages.original_text: "Well, how should I put it... with the Lord Inquisitor on the station, folks still have to keep a bit of a lid on their activities, but with Incendia and her hounds gone, I can definitely breathe easier. Shipments are slowly starting up again, anyone who worked with Chorda has been thrown for a loop Footfall-style, and folks can do business in the Amasecus again without any trouble."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, a ver cómo lo digo... Con el Lord Inquisidor en la estación, la gente sigue teniendo que camuflar un poco sus actividades, pero ahora que Incendia y sus perros han desaparecido, respiro con más tranquilidad. Los cargamentos están volviendo a la normalidad, cualquiera que trabajara con Chorda se ha dado un paseo al estilo de Paso y la gente puede volver a negociar en el Amasecus sin problema».

languages.text: 「なんていうかな…ロード・インクィジターがステーションにいることで、皆少しばかり大人しくする必要があるけど、インセンディアとあいつの猟犬がいなくなったことでだいぶ肩の荷が降りたよ。出荷も徐々に再開しているし、コーダと一緒に働いていた奴らはフットフォールの洗礼を受けたし、誰にもとやかく言われずもう一度アマセッカスで商売ができるようになったね」
languages.original_text: "Well, how should I put it... with the Lord Inquisitor on the station, folks still have to keep a bit of a lid on their activities, but with Incendia and her hounds gone, I can definitely breathe easier. Shipments are slowly starting up again, anyone who worked with Chorda has been thrown for a loop Footfall-style, and folks can do business in the Amasecus again without any trouble."

traits.locale_text: 「なんていうかな…ロード・インクィジターがステーションにいることで、皆少しばかり大人しくする必要があるけど、インセンディアとあいつの猟犬がいなくなったことでだいぶ肩の荷が降りたよ。出荷も徐々に再開しているし、コーダと一緒に働いていた奴らはフットフォールの洗礼を受けたし、誰にもとやかく言われずもう一度アマセッカスで商売ができるようになったね」

languages.text: "Nun, wie soll ich es formulieren ... das der Großinquisitor auf der Station weilt, müssen die Leute sich bei ihren Aktivitäten bedeckter halten als sonst, aber ohne Incendia und ihre Hunde kann ich tatsächlich deutlich befreiter atmen. Die Lieferungen kommen langsam wieder in Gang, allen, die mit Chorda zusammengearbeitet hatten, hat es nach Footfall-Art ordentlich die Sprache verschlagen, und die Leute können wieder ohne Probleme Geschäfte im Amasecus machen."
languages.original_text: "Well, how should I put it... with the Lord Inquisitor on the station, folks still have to keep a bit of a lid on their activities, but with Incendia and her hounds gone, I can definitely breathe easier. Shipments are slowly starting up again, anyone who worked with Chorda has been thrown for a loop Footfall-style, and folks can do business in the Amasecus again without any trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, wie soll ich es formulieren ... das der Großinquisitor auf der Station weilt, müssen die Leute sich bei ihren Aktivitäten bedeckter halten als sonst, aber ohne Incendia und ihre Hunde kann ich tatsächlich deutlich befreiter atmen. Die Lieferungen kommen langsam wieder in Gang, allen, die mit Chorda zusammengearbeitet hatten, hat es nach Footfall-Art ordentlich die Sprache verschlagen, und die Leute können wieder ohne Probleme Geschäfte im Amasecus machen."

languages.text: « Alors, comment vous expliquer... Avec le seigneur inquisiteur dans la station, il faut toujours faire un peu attention à ne pas ébruiter nos activités, mais maintenant qu'Incendia et ses sbires sont partis, je respire un peu mieux. Les affaires reprennent doucement, tous ceux qui travaillaient avec Chorda ne savent plus trop sur quel pied danser, et les gens peuvent recommencer leurs combines à l'Amasecus sans ennuis. »
languages.original_text: "Well, how should I put it... with the Lord Inquisitor on the station, folks still have to keep a bit of a lid on their activities, but with Incendia and her hounds gone, I can definitely breathe easier. Shipments are slowly starting up again, anyone who worked with Chorda has been thrown for a loop Footfall-style, and folks can do business in the Amasecus again without any trouble."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, comment vous expliquer... Avec le seigneur inquisiteur dans la station, il faut toujours faire un peu attention à ne pas ébruiter nos activités, mais maintenant qu'Incendia et ses sbires sont partis, je respire un peu mieux. Les affaires reprennent doucement, tous ceux qui travaillaient avec Chorda ne savent plus trop sur quel pied danser, et les gens peuvent recommencer leurs combines à l'Amasecus sans ennuis. »

languages.text: "Nasıl desem... Lord Engizisyoncu istasyonda olduğu için insanlar iş çevirirken dikkatli olmak zorunda olsa da İncendia ve itleri ortalıkta olmadığı için kesinlikle rahat bir nefes aldım. Sevkiyatlar da yavaş yavaş yeniden başladı, Chorda'yla çalışan herkes Binliman usulü cezasını buldu. İnsanlar artık başları derde girmeden yeniden Amasekus'ta iş yapabiliyor."
languages.original_text: "Well, how should I put it... with the Lord Inquisitor on the station, folks still have to keep a bit of a lid on their activities, but with Incendia and her hounds gone, I can definitely breathe easier. Shipments are slowly starting up again, anyone who worked with Chorda has been thrown for a loop Footfall-style, and folks can do business in the Amasecus again without any trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi, nasıl desem... Lord Engizisyoncu istasyonda olduğu için insanlar iş çevirirken saklı tutmak zorunda olsa da, Incendia ve itleri ortalıkta olmadığı için kesinlikle rahat bir nefes aldım. Sevkiyatlar da yavaş yavaş yeniden başladı, Chorda'yla çalışan herkes Binliman usulü cezasını buldu ve artık insanlar yeniden başları derde girmeden Amasekus'ta iş yapabiliyor."
